destination.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address of the target network node based on the specific route type. Values are:* For a default route, there is no value because the system will use the specified gateway IP address.* For a host route, the value is the host IP address.* For a subnet route, the value is a subnet IP address.

gateway.description: IP address of the gateway associated with the route.

id.description: Unique identifier of the file interface route object.

prefix_length.description: IPv4 or IPv6 prefix length for the route.
